body_html:
I've placed a comment on this in the gradient code here: tensorflow/python/ops/math_grad.py#L889

I've spent some time trying to come up with a version that doesn't use a division by x, but didn't come up with anything elegant.

body:
I've placed a comment on this in the gradient code here: [`tensorflow/python/ops/math_grad.py#L889`](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/51fd9c024c4544ba1ef60862ec3f55b6e3ae79b1/tensorflow/python/ops/math_grad.py#L889)

I've spent some time trying to come up with a version that doesn't use a division by `x`, but didn't  come up with anything elegant.
